channel.title: I got a problem with my RSPS
channel.description:
hello everyone,
i got a little problem with my RSPS. A few days ago me and my friend decided to make our own RSPS, i followed alot of guides online but it doesnt work and i dont know whats the problem is. Im dutch so i will try to do my best to speak english, i will explain all my steps with pictures and i hope you guys can find a thing i missed or something else so i can make my own RSPS. thank you for taking the time to read this. [b] 1)[/b] i downloaded [b]WINRAR[/b], i dont need to show you guys a picture of that i think.
[b]2)[/b] i searched my own [b]source and client[/b] at moparscape fourms and extracted with winrar
[b]3)[/b] i download [b]JAVA JDK[/b] here is a picture of it (sorry but i dont really know how to add an picture so i did it by a site i created fastly, no worry there are NO VIRUSSEN of other things, i only want to make my own RSPS and i hope you guys can help me)
[url=http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015125]http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015125[/url]
and when i donwload it and save it in a map it looks like this:
[url=http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015226]http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015226[/url]
if i did something wrong please tell me so i can fix it and i can make my own rsps
[b]4)[/b] i made an account on [b]no-ip [/b] and i added a host:
[url=http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016694]http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016694[/url]
i hope i made a mistake and i forgot to fill in any thing so thats the problem of my error
[b]5) [/b] i download [b]no-ip duc[/b] and it looks like this:
[url=http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016813]http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016813[/url]
[b]6)[/b] i had to change [b]PATH[/b] AND [b]CLASSPATH[/b] like this:
PATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;
CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
[b]7)[/b] some guides say that i have to dowload [b]qTORRENT[/b] i also did that and i filled in:
[url=http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121017297]http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121017297[/url]
sorry its in dutch but i dont really know what to fill in what number? if its needed
then i go to my server and press run or something and it says that he cant find JAVA, i really hate it i want to make my own rsps i hope you guys can help me out because i tried alot of things.
but thanks to read and hopefully it gonna work.
Gr.
Xero.

item.title: I got a problem with my RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Xeroscape Xeroscape
item.description:
@Xeroscape wrote:

hello everyone,

i got a little problem with my RSPS. A few days ago me and my friend decided to make our own RSPS, i followed alot of guides online but it doesnt work and i dont know whats the problem is. Im dutch so i will try to do my best to speak english, i will explain all my steps with pictures and i hope you guys can find a thing i missed or something else so i can make my own RSPS. thank you for taking the time to read this.

1) i downloaded WINRAR, i dont need to show you guys a picture of that i think.

2) i searched my own source and client at moparscape fourms and extracted with winrar

3) i download JAVA JDK here is a picture of it (sorry but i dont really know how to add an picture so i did it by a site i created fastly, no worry there are NO VIRUSSEN of other things, i only want to make my own RSPS and i hope you guys can help me)

http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015125

and when i donwload it and save it in a map it looks like this:

http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121015226

if i did something wrong please tell me so i can fix it and i can make my own rsps

4) i made an account on no-ip and i added a host:

http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016694

i hope i made a mistake and i forgot to fill in any thing so thats the problem of my error

5) i download no-ip duc and it looks like this:

http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121016813

6) i had to change PATH AND CLASSPATH like this:

PATH

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;

CLASSPATH

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

7) some guides say that i have to dowload qTORRENT i also did that and i filled in:

http://members.webs.com/MembersB/editAppPage.jsp?app=photos&path=%2Fphoto%2Fadd%3FfromInstall%3D1%26title%3DPhotos#photos/photo?photoid=121017297

sorry its in dutch but i dont really know what to fill in what number? if its needed

then i go to my server and press run or something and it says that he cant find JAVA, i really hate it i want to make my own rsps i hope you guys can help me out because i tried alot of things.

but thanks to read and hopefully it gonna work.

Gr.

Xero.

Read full topic
item.source: I got a problem with my RSPS
